entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'he' and 'Harry'. He is planning something alone at night.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: A person who is bending over another body when Harry approaches him. Neville seems scared of what Harry might be thinking of doing.

relationships.description: Harry moves towards Neville, who is bending over another body. This is described as Harry 'pulling off the Cloak' and having a plan.
Neville seems concerned about what Harry might be thinking of doing, as he asks 'Harry, you're not thinking of handing yourself over?'
